summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: HeroSection profile src updated to the exact provided LinkedIn URL while keeping the circular styling. No other Hero content changes are evident in the provided HeroSection.tsx diff. However, there are unrelated metadata/documentation changes in project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added internal tracking entries (AR-1, AR-2) and marked them as pending in project_state.json
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the Hero profile photo URL; it did not request changes to project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated frontend-file-summaries.txt content describing numerous unrelated changes across the app (e.g., App footer attribution, CV data contact updates, navigation/logo changes, theme/colors, SEO hook, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained the change scope to updating the Hero profile photo source and not altering other CV content/theme/layout; these additional described changes were not requested (even if only documented).
